\begin{equation*}
\begin{cases}
x'(t)={\color{red}A}x+{\color{black}f},& t\in [0,+\infty)\\
x(0)=x_0
\end{cases}
\end{equation*}
\begin{equation*}
x(t)=e^{t\color{red}A}x_0+\int_0^t e^{(t-s){\color{red}A}f(s)}ds
\end{equation*}
